servinfo.title: DTC P1620: Detection of Airbag Deployment

item.ptxt: Conditions for applying fault finding procedures to stored faults:
The fault is declared present after the engine is started.
If the fault is present, the Red stop warning light (gravity 2 warning light) is lit.
This faults is set when ECM receives a airbag deployment signal from SDM via CAN.

entry.ptxt: Check air bag module has deployed.
If air bag modules is deployed, repair and inspection vehicle referring to Repair and Inspection Required after Accident .
If air bag module is NOT deployed, substitute a known good ECM or SDM and recheck.
